Description: Square blue glazed composition pectoral decorated on the face with a black outline representation of Anubis upon a plinth and on the reverse with a djed-pillar and a thet-girdle; Hieroglyphic text on both sides; pierced through the cornice and the lower edge for suspension/attachment.
Curator's comments: Published: W. Seipel, Ägypten Vol. 1, Linz 1989, p.239 [399].
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
